about_the_game:
Unscrew! Rotate! Analyze! Drop the octopuses and dive deeper into the ruins!

Dive deeper and deeper, solving puzzles with screws which will help you on the way down into the ruins! In “Screw Dive” the player will control Humanling & Driverling and explore the deep ocean ruins. Unscrewing the screws will loosen the stage and might result in a great collapse.

In order to dive deeper into the ruins you will have to use the screws to get rid of octopuses guarding the ruins.

A simple un/screwing action game!

Unscrewing screws will loosen the stage,

be careful not to fall off the stage yourself!

It is said that there are some special screw as well…

Analyze the stage and drop all the octopuses!

Drop all the octopuses in order to clear a stage.

You will only have a limited amount of battery life which means a limit how many times you can unscrew a screw.

There will be a lot of missions and advancements, so be prepared to figure out the best way to clear the stages!

Characters

Humanling

Humanling is a treasure hunter, especially for sunken treasure.

Together with its best friend Driverling, they look for unseen treasure day and night.

One day, traveling in the ocean they find a mysterious ruin on the sea floor and…

Driverling

It resembles a driver and has a lot of stickers put on by Humanling, its best friend.

Mainly attaches itself onto Humanlings back, waiting for the moment it might come handy.

Its main downside is that without battery it won’t be able to move.

  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5–8400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Xe Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Turn the screw and unravel the mechanism to dive deep into the ruins! By pulling out the screws stuck in various places, the fixed stage collapsed. In order to drop the octopus that protects the ruins, let's unravel the mechanism of the ruins that is fixed to the screw!
